# Hugo Quiz

A hugo shortcode for writing quizzes with a markdown-like syntax: https://github.com/nitinbabariya/hugo-quiz.

**Try out the live code editor: https://nitinbabariya.github.io/quiztest-live-editor/**

{{< quiztest >}}
{{< /quiztest >}}
